attributes.additional_details: Ban their sale and use, as simple as that, they provide a risk to that has no counter benefit to justify their use
attributes.background: New Years eve 2019 a single Sky Lantern caused massive destruction and killed many primates at Krefeld Zoo, it could happen here. This is uncontrolled arson promoted by suppliers. These Sky Lanterns serve no purpose and provide no benefit to anyone other than the suppliers

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310556
